str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
All, the whole, altogether. Absolutely all or every one.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Apparently a primary word; a people.
Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.
